article_title: Washington's Never-Ending Controversy: What To Call Its Airport

article_metadata.author: Andrew Bender

og.description: 72 percent of Republicans use the name Reagan when referring to the airport, while 64 percent of Democrats call it by the former name, National, or the airport code.
